name: Deadmageddon
description:
A Top Down Wave-Based Zombie Defense Game with buildable structures and 3 different weapons. 

The game was made in 3 months for our USEREXP course during our second year in Benilde.  Since the course's focus is to design mechanics for user experience to be intuitive, all three members members contributed ideas for the game's design.
